name: Jie Ren
content: Jie Ren | Computer Science | School of Computing, Data Sciences & Physics | William & Mary Skip to main content Education Ph.D. Electrical Engineering and Computer Science, University of California Merced ; B.S. Computer Science and Engineering, Beijing Institute of Technology Areas of Specialization High-Performance Computing, Parallel & Distributed Systems Bio Dr. Jie Ren is an Assistant Professor of Computer Science at William & Mary. Her research interests include High-Performance Computing, parallel and distributed systems, heterogeneous and composable memory systems, and affordable machine learning systems. Her work aims to improve the accessibility, efficiency, and scalability of modern computing infrastructures.
